articles.title: The face mask that could end the pandemic - East Idaho News
articles.description: (CNN) — Getting Americans masked up is a top priority for the Biden administration. Biden, who calls wearing masks “a patriotic act,” signed an executive order Wednesday — his very first as President — to ask Americans to wear masks of their choice for the fi…
